Address: Champs de Mars - Tour Eiffel - Paris
Description: This elegantly furnished and decorated 60 sqm apartment is located on Rue de Montessuy in the 7th arrondissement of Paris, just a 2-minute walk from the Champ de Mars and the Eiffel Tower. It consists of 3 rooms, including 1 bedroom with a double bed and ensuite bathroom with a dressing room, a living room with a sofa bed for additional sleeping space, and a third room consisting of a fully equipped kitchen open to a beautiful dining room that can accommodate eight people. A second bathroom completes the ensemble. This furnished rental apartment can accommodate up to 3 people with the sofa bed. It is located on the 3rd floor with an elevator and benefits from all the necessary equipment for a peaceful stay (1.80m bed with a 5-star mattress, televisions in the bedroom and living room with Bose sound system). Perfectly served by public transportation (Pont de l'Alma/RER C), you will find many shops and services nearby (Champ de Mars Park, Branly Museum, grocery stores, nearby gym club, newsstand, supermarkets, restaurants, dry cleaning, pharmacy, brasserie, bakery, butcher). Tenants are asked to contribute to the cleaning expenses at a rate of €120/month for 3 hours of cleaning once a week.

This "top of the range" apartment has some rooms in the basement, including the large kitchen (vaulted stone cellars) and, because of the greater humidity downstairs, and the stone which can crumble depending on the period (dust falling from the ceiling), these beds are proposed as extra beds. The calculation of the price of the apartment takes into account this reality. These rooms in the basement (vaulted cellars) are very pleasant in summer when it is very hot outside, because they remain very cool. To be avoided in winter for people who can't stand humidity. Of course all rooms are heated if necessary.
